summary: Arceus, creator of the world, comes to pass judgement on humanity for the theft of the Jewel of Life, but Ash Ketchum and his friends are sent back in time to discover and possible reverse the events that led to Arceus' vendetta.
cast: Sarah Natochenny|Michele Knotz|Emily Bauer|James Carter Cathcart|Kayzie Rogers|Bill Rogers|Rodger Parsons|Ikue Ôtani|Carmen Borgia|Wayne Grayson|Dan Green|Jason Griffith|Carrie Keranen|Marc Thompson|William Tost|Tom Wayland|Tim Werenko|Tsutomu Densaka|Yuzuru Fujimoto|Megumi Hayashibara|Inuko Inuyama|Yûji Kishi|Kii Kitano|Motoko Kumai|Rica Matsumoto|Shin'ichirô Miki|Akihiro Miwa|Kei Shindo|Megumi Toyoguchi|Yûji Ueda|Kôichi Yamadera|Kiyotaka Furushima|Chinami Nishimura
title: Pokemon: Arceus y la joya de la vida
